pkgmetadata.longdescription: Informative Hypothesis Testing Web Applications // Offering enhanced statistical power compared to traditional hypothesis testing methods, informative hypothesis testing allows researchers to explicitly model their expectations regarding the relationships among parameters. An important software tool for this framework is 'restriktor'. The 'mmirestriktor' package provides 'shiny' web applications to implement some of the basic functionality of 'restriktor'. The mmirestriktor() function launches a 'shiny' application for fitting and analyzing models with constraints. The FbarCards() function launches a card game application which can help build intuition about informative hypothesis testing. The iht_interpreter() helps interpret informative hypothesis testing results based on guidelines in Vanbrabant and Rosseel (2020) doi:10.4324/9780429273872-14.
